Retrieve departments that have been pushed to Code42 from SCIM or User Directory Sync.

The results returned can then be used in the Watchlists API to automatically assign users to watchlists by department.

For information about pushing department information to Code42, see our [support article](https://support.code42.com/hc/en-us/articles/14827687477143#push-groups-to-code42-0-5).
